Series

The Series page is used to to create and manage series and seasons. The body of the page will list all series that have been created.

Create series
  1. Click Create Series.
  2. Enter a Name for the series.
  3. Click Save.
Show me how
Details
Publish / Unpublish series

Series that are published will appear in Beacon apps. Series that are unpublished will not appear in Beacon apps.

The Status column in the series list indicates if a series is published or unpublished:

  • - Series is published
  • - Series is unpublished

To publish a series:

  1. Select the checkbox next to the series name.
  2. Click Publish.

To unpublish a series:

  1. Select the checkbox next to the series name.
  2. Click Unpublish.
Details
Delete series
  1. Select the checkbox next to the series name.
  2. Click .
Details
View series details
  1. Click on a series name.
